pkgmetadata.longdescription: Locate Trans and Intersex-Friendly Toilets // Access the 'Refuge' API, a web-application for locating trans and intersex-friendly restrooms, including unisex and accessible restrooms. Includes data on the location of restrooms, along with directions, comments, user ratings and amenities. Coverage is global, but data is most comprehensive in the United States. See https://www.refugerestrooms.org/api/docs/ for full API documentation.
